basic.description: The taxation of non-residents and of foreign-source income. The principal focus is on Canadian tax rules and their application, but the course also addresses broader questions such as the problems of taxing multinational enterprises, the regulation of transfer-pricing, the use of tax havens, and international cooperation to prevent fiscal evasion. (To be offered jointly with LAW-506.)  Not offered 2010-2011.
basic.subject: LAW
basic.title: International Taxation
